regen.absent_element: remove assigned work items when a project is split into multiple projects
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically reassign or remove work items from the original project when it is split into multiple projects.

regen.absent_element: warning for removal of work items from a project
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the user when removing work items from a project to ensure confirmation of changes.

regen.absent_element: notification or confirmation after project split
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the user or provide a confirmation upon successfully splitting a project into multiple projects.

label: The user shall be able to combine multiple projects into a master project.
absence: action of combining multiple projects into a master project
